title.rendered: The Best Web Design Companies in 2023

content.rendered:
The website design company you choose will significantly impact your website’s look, feel, and functionality.

Whether you’re planning to redesign your website, or need a brand new website, a great web design company will take your ideas and turn them into a beautiful, user-friendly website that reflects your brand and helps you achieve your business goals.

There are many web design and development companies out there, so how do you know which one is right for you?

We compiled a list of the top web design companies via third-party resources to help you decide.

This list includes web design firms that appear on more than one list of the best web design companies and are often mentioned as good companies to work with. We have listed them in alphabetical order.

CHAPTER ONE

Our Pick of Top Web Design Agencies

While there are many excellent website design companies, these are some of the best.

1. Active Theory

Website: http://activetheory.net/

Location: Los Angeles, California

Average Project Price: Min. Project $25,000

Team Size: 2 to 9

Public Rating via Google: 5.0

Active Theory is a digital agency that creates responsive design websites, apps, and interactive experiences. The company has worked with notable clients, including Welcome to Hogwarts, Bon Iver Visualizer, Kandinsky VR, Coachella Live, and more.

Their specialization is creating interactive web design, mobile app development, and augmented reality/virtual reality (AR/VR) experiences.

VR Technology is their focus, and they’ve worked on many AR/VR projects and used them for both marketing and entertainment purposes to create user experiences that are memorable and interactive.

2. Adaptable

Website: http://weareadaptable.com/

Location: London, England, and Birmingham, UK

Average Project Price: $10,000

Team Size: 2 to 9

Public Rating via Google: N/A

Founded in 2013, Adaptable is a top web designing company in the UK. Adaptable focuses on user-first website design and web development. This means they put the user’s needs first when designing and building websites.

Adaptable has worked with some big names, including Boop, Whitworth Bros, PM Connect, Boss at Home, and more.

3. Baunfire

Website: https://www.baunfire.com/

Location: San Jose, California

Average Project Price: $100,000+

Team Size: 10 to 49

Public Rating via Google: N/A

Baunfire is one of the most successful creative agencies around. They are a web design company that specializes in helping organizations create a powerful online presence.

The team has worked with clients such as Optimal Dynamics, Instabase, Orbi, Benchling, Ples Systems, and more.

Baunfire’s services include web design, website development, UX/UI design, branding identity, insights & discovery, graphic design, search engine optimization, product design, marketing materials, and pretty much everything you could ask for in a digital marketing agency.

Pushing boundaries in web design is what Baunfire does best.

Stationed in Silicon Valley, they are at the heart of innovation. The team works with clients to design unique websites that accurately reflect their brand.

4. Craft and Crew

Link: https://craftandcrew.ca/

Location: Ottawa, Canada

Team Size: 11 to 50

Public Rating via Google: N/A

Craft and Crew is a web design agency based in Ottawa, Canada. They work with small businesses and startups to help them build user-friendly and visually appealing websites.

Their team of designers and developers are experts that worked with clients including Athabasca University, Realtor.ca, Recollective, and more.

“Craft & Crew is a global website production company for leading technology brands such as Google Ventures and SurveyMonkey. We believe the world’s best web design companies have a deep understanding of how to balance organizational priorities, brand requirements, and end-user expectations to create solutions that meet the goals of these diverse stakeholders.”

Dave Hale, CEO of Craft & Crew

Accessible websites are their primary focus, and they strongly understand how to design websites that meet high standards. They practice a three-step process in completing every web design project:

  • Audit
  • Remediate any accessibility issues
  • Maintain the website to make any necessary future updates

5. Digital Silk

Website: https://www.digitalsilk.com/

Location: New York City, Miami, Chicago, and Milano

Average Project Price: $10,000+

Team Size: 50 to 249

Public Rating via Google: 5.0

Results-driven, that’s what Digital Silk is known for in its approach to website design and development. They work with companies of all sizes, from enterprise organizations to startups, to help them reach their target audience through the power of the internet.

Digital Silk has worked with renowned brands, including IBM, HP, Xerox, Impendi Analytics, We Care, and more.

They also do ecommerce development and ecommerce web design, which they have a lot of experience in.

6. Dogstudio

Website: http://www.dogstudio.co/

Location: Chicago, Illinois, Mexico, Amsterdam, and Namur

Team Size: 10 to 49

Public Rating via Google: N/A

Dogs are known for being loyal companions, and Dogstudio lives up to its name by being a trustworthy partner to its clients. Employees even get a dog-themed nickname—how cute!

Dogstudio builds custom websites; notable past clients include Navy Pier, Royal Opera of Wallonia, The Kennedy Center, Ginetta, and more.

7. Dotlogics

Website: https://www.dotlogics.com/

Location: East Northport, New York, and Westbury, New York

Average Project Price: $25,000+

Team Size: 10 to 49

Public Rating via Google: N/A

Dotlogics is a professional web design and development, ecommerce, and custom software development company.

They take a problem-solving approach to every project and have a long list of satisfied clients, including Gardenia, Brown University, PEC Logistics, Broadway Basketeers, McDonald’s, and more.

8. Jorban

Website: https://huemor.rocks/

Location: New York, New York, and Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania

Average Project Price: $50,000 – $100,000

Team Size: 50 to 100

Public Rating via Google: New York page 4.9, Pittsburgh page 5.0

Of course, we had to put ourselves on the list! With ten years of experience, we’re a web design company helping brands tell their stories online.

We work with companies of all sizes, from small businesses to enterprise-level organizations.

And we’ve been recognized by some big names in the industry, including Exiger, Glow Recipe, The Human League, Revlon, The Special Olympics, The United Nations, United Way, Geico, NBC Sports, and more! That’s a lot of happy customers.

“Websites can be the most powerful tool in your marketing toolbox. Building one the right way one takes a lot of time, effort, and financial investment. Make sure you find a company that will be a partner, keep your best interests in mind, and be someone you want to work with for 6+ months.”

Ahmad Jorban, Co-Founder of Jorban

But we don’t just design and develop pretty websites on WordPress, HubSpot, Drupal, and Shopify.

We strategize, research, and execute holistic digital marketing plans that include SEO, content strategy, content marketing, social media, paid media, conversion optimization, website redesign, site speed optimization and more.

And we do all of this with one goal: to help our clients achieve their KPI goals and create a website that produces results.

9. Mightybytes

Website: https://www.mightybytes.com/

Location: Chicago, Illinois

Average Project Price: $10,000+

Team Size: 2 to 9

Public Rating via Google: 5.0

Integrating SEO, CRO, and UX into every project, Mightybytes is a web design agency that cares about results. Based in Chicago, this web design company has a team of under ten that provides comprehensive services. Services include web design and development, branding, and strategy.

For nearly twenty-five years in the web design industry, Mightybytes has worked with impressive clients like National Geographic, Court Theatre, PNC Bank, Pearson, Northwestern University, and more.

10. Motto

Website: https://wearemotto.com/

Location: New York, New York, and Dallas, Texas

Average Project Price: $100,000

Team Size: 10 to 49

Public Rating via Google: N/A

Motto was founded in 2005 as a branding design agency. They infuse their branding roots into every web design project they work on.

Motto has worked with large companies such as Hopscotch, Hello Alice, Ninjas in Pajamas, Blix, and more.

Rare Breed: A Guide to Success for the Defiant, Dangerous, and Different is a book written and authored by Motto. “Out of the box” thinking is what emphasizes their company culture.

11. Pointer Creative

Website: http://pointercreative.com/

Location: Ottawa, Canada

Team Size: 10 to 49

Public Rating via Google: N/A

Pointer Creative is a web design and development agency that has worked with many notable clients, including Corkcicle, Cha Cha, Bill Blass, JuneShine, and more.

Web design and development is their specialization, but they also offer to create websites for ecommerce clients as a primary niche.

12. Responsival

Website: https://www.responsival.com/

Location: Charlotte, North Carolina, and Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania

Average Project Price: $10,000+

Team Size: 10 to 49

Public Rating via Google: 5.0

They believe in long-term relationships with both their clients and employees. The team has a unique skill set that helps them take on projects of all sizes in many industries.

Responsival has worked with many notable clients, including Day Owl, Austin Jam Company, InMotion, and the Heinz Chapel.

Content marketing is their primary specialization. Responsival has a team of copywriters, designers, and strategists that work together to create high-quality content that helps their clients achieve their business goals.

CHAPTER two

What Makes a Great Agency?

The best web design companies have a few things in common. Here are some factors that we took into consideration when compiling our list:

Strong Portfolio

The best web design companies have a strong portfolio of happy clients. This indicates that they know their stuff and can deliver on their promises.

Good Communication

Good communication is vital in any relationship and is imperative when working with a web design company. You want to be able to trust that they understand your vision and can translate it into a beautiful, functional website.

Focus on the User

A great web design company will always put the user first. They’ll design with your target audience in mind, ensuring that the result is a website that’s easy to use and meets their needs.

Team of Experts

When you work with a web design company, you’re not just working with one person. You’re working with a team of experts who each have their area of expertise. This ensures that your website is designed and developed to the highest standards.

CHAPTER three

What to Look for When Interviewing Possible Agencies?

There are two things you should keep in mind when interviewing potential website building companies:

Actions and Results

This is the most important thing. Does this company have a track record of designing successful websites? Can they show you results that prove their worth? Do their websites have good conversion rates?

If they can’t, move on. There are plenty of other companies that can.

Good Vibes and Feelings

This is important but not as important as actions and results. Does this company make you feel good? Do they seem like they would be fun to work with?

If both of these questions answer yes, you’re on the right track. If not, keep looking.

Ask professional web design agencies tons of questions. This will help you weed out the bad apples from the good. And based on your answers, you should be able to decide whether or not to work with them.

CHAPTER Four

Choose a Great Website Design Company

There you have it! These are the best web design companies and branding agencies in the business.

If you’re looking for a team of experts to help you create a beautiful, functional website, then one of these companies is sure to be a good fit.

So many businesses today rely on their website as a critical part of their marketing strategy.

If you’re not happy with your current website or if you don’t have one at all, then it’s time to take action. These web design companies will be able to help you create the perfect online presence for your business.

Do you want to make a unique website that reflects your company’s values? Do you want to attract more customers and grow your business? Then don’t wait any longer.

Contact us today to get a solid digital strategy in place for your web presence. Our expert web designers are happy to chat with you about your customized web design needs.

CHAPTER Five

FAQ About the Best Website Design Agencies

We’ve covered a lot of info about how to select the best web design company for your project. Here are some additional questions that our clients typically have. If you don’t see your question covered, don’t hesitate to reach out.

What makes Jorbandifferent from other web design firms and development companies?

Aside from our amazing websites, our attention to our customers.

Whether you’re a tech company, a supplements store, a real estate company, a law firm, a marketing company, an apparel brand, an IT solutions company, a video production agency, or a manufacturing company, we give you our full attention and work to maximize the impact of your digital presence.

Our goal is always to capture the attention of potential customers and turn them into actual customers.

Do your websites perform well in terms of search engine optimization?

We build all our websites to be blazing fast and optimized for conversions. Search engines reward those factors…but there’s more to SEO.

Other aspects of search engine optimization, such as content publication and acquiring quality backlinks, are outside the scope of a website design or website development project.

What content management systems do Jorbanwebsites use?

We work on Hubspot, Shopify, WooCommerce, Wordpress, and Drupal content management systems.

Our world-class WordPress developers, Shopify developers, etc. will create a responsive design that generates attention and customers for your business, regardless of which CMS you use.

Your website will perform flawlessly on the CMS platform of your choice, and will run a custom theme designed and developed by us.

What areas of the US do you serve?

We are based in Pittsburgh, PA with a satellite office in New York, NY. But we serve clients across the US.

Whether you’re in San Francisco, Denver, Dallas, San Diego, Chicago, or Spokane, we will give you the same care and expertise.

The best web design resources from one of the best website design agencies.

Looking for web design ideas and inspiration? These articles should help.

  • The Best B2B Website Examples
  • Why Website Design Standards Matter
  • How to Switch Web Design Agencies if You Need To
  • The Greatest Website Design Examples
  • Getting Leadership Buy-In for Site Redesign
  • Creating Effective UX Design Strategy
  • The Most Common Website Redesign Mistakes
  • Understanding Web Design Vs Development
  • Knowing When You’re Due for a Website Redesign
  • Our Site Redesign Worksheet
  • Amazing Service Page Designs
  • Our Website Design Procedure
  • Why Innovative Design Matters
  • Designing Stellar “About Us” Pages
  • The Right Way to do Category Page Design
  • Fixing Bad Website Designs
  • Our Favorite Shopify Store Designs
  • Getting Product Page Design Right
  • Understanding Homepage Design
  • Fighting Stolen Web Design
  • WooCommerce vs Shopify for Ecommerce
  • Getting Shopify Image Sizes Right
